Metadata: Dangerous waters: boating safety display game (CD ROM game)

"Dangerous Waters" is an interactive CD-ROM computer game about boating safety. It will only only for Windows 95/NT and 98 for PCs and OS 7.5 to 9 for Macs. The virtual boater is faced with fast-paced recreational boating simulations, and receives instant feedback on performance, The game is intended to be used as an educational tool at boat shows, marinas, schools, and youth events.
